review: Love all the programs videos. Have a problem with  stick. Fire Stick. When  I switch from cable to Fir Stick.it does not work and I have to unplug Stick. Same thing happens with my ons Stick also.  basically happy with stcick.
author: eileen irgang

review: FIRE STICK,WHY? Installation,was a breeze,setup and settling in to explore took 15 minutes maximum,and all was sublime until the stuttering and frozen playback began. We explored forums but have found no true solution. Overheating, perhaps?
author: Queenie 55

review: After waiting forever for this, it won't connect to my home wifi network.  Do not waste your money!
author: Scott Wolff

review: I like it, but problem is my wifi needs to be rebooted every night for us to watch, plus, need to unplug and replug insert every time I use???
author: Paul Jolie

review: Loses connection more than my Roku but less than my Google TV. I had to lower my Netflix quality to the lowest setting for streaming. Otherwise the show I was watching would skip around. It shows that wifi signal is max strength.
author: M.Brand

review: Amazing! Great instructions. We absolutely love this product. Perfect compact size remote.
author: Karen Hokenson

review: LOVE the FIRE TV STICK!!!! you can do so many things. and it's got many great apps. It truly meets my expectations and it's so easy to use my 5 year old loves it.
author: kim marten
